effect.scarlet-violet: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.the-teal-mask: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.the-indigo-disk: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.scarlet-violet: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.the-teal-mask: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.the-indigo-disk: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
